(Amendment) Order 2023.

title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: In this Order “Order of 2021” means the Control of Fishing for Salmon
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Order of 2021” means the Control of Fishing for Salmon 

Order 2021 (S.I. No 102 2021).
text_norm: 2 order order 2021 mean control fishing salmon order 2021 (s.i 102 2021)

title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: 3. The Order of 2021 is amended –
text_raw:
3. The Order of 2021 is amended – 

(a) 

by the substitution of Schedule 1 to this Order for Schedule 1 to 
the Order of 2021, and 

(b) by the substitution of Schedule 2 to this Order for Schedule 2 to 

the Order of 2021. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th March, 2023.

title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons
text_raw:
1. 

Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons 

(a) 

If you held a salmon net fishing licence for any of the last 3 
salmon fishing seasons, indicate in the table below the year or 
years in which you held the licence and the numbers of fish 
caught. Alternatively, you may tick the box at the top of the 
table for the number of fish caught and IFI will enter these 
details onto the form from your logbook returns during those 
years. 

(b) 

If you have not held a salmon net fishing licence for any of the 
last 3 salmon fishing seasons, but were authorised and named on 
a licence held by another person, complete the table below 
giving appropriate details of the licence holder and the number 
of fish caught. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [98] 5 

Table 

Please tick if you wish these details to 
be taken from your logbook returns. 

( ) 

Year Licence holder or 
authorised person 

Number of 
salmon caught 

Number of sea trout 
over 40cm caught 

(Please state which) 

1 

2 

3

heading: Declaration
text_raw:
2.

Carlingford and Irish Lights Commission during the last 3 years 
(If so give particulars).

(c)

the ______________

fishery district. 

in

 6 [98]

Address: ________________________________________________________ 

Tel. No.: _________________________ 

Signature of applicant: ___________________ 

Date: ___________ 

Part 2 

CERTIFICATE 

This certificate must be completed in every application. 

I, _____________________ certify that Mr/Mrs/Ms _____________________ 

who is known to me, is ordinarily resident in the address stated in Part I and 
signed this form in my presence. 

Official Stamp of 

Witness* 

Signature: _______________________ 

 *Position: _______________________ 

 Address: ________________________ 

 _______________________________ 

*Note: The signature of the applicant for a fishing licence must be witnessed 
by either a Peace Commissioner, Clergyman, Fishery Officer, or member of the 
Garda Síochána in whose fishery district the applicant resides. The latest date 
for receipt of completed application forms is 5 April 2023 at 5:00 p.m. 
Completed application forms should be sent to: 

River Basin District Director, 

Inland Fisheries Ireland 

_______________________________ 

_______________________________ 

PARTS 1 AND 2 OF THIS APPLICATION FORM MUST BE COMPLETED 
BEFORE THE FORM IS RETURNED TO THE APPPOPRIATE IFI OFFICE 
AT THE ADDRESS INDICATED IN PART 3. PLEASE ATTACH BIRTH 
CERTIFICATE OF APPLICANT AND IF APPLICABLE, OF PERSON 
AUTHORISED TO OPERATE THE LICENCE.
